thread.section_title: TrekEarth - South America Travel Photo Gallery
thread.title: Health Walk

title: Health Walk
text:
Only registered TrekEarth members may write critiques. Photographer's Note 
There are many studies showing the benefits of the walking. And walking in a green are is great. Here the couple was walking at the Botanical Garden of Curitiba. Benefits of walking: 1. It strengthens your heart 2. It lowers disease risk 3. It keeps weight in check 4. It can help prevent dementia 5. It can help prevent osteoporosis 6. It help strengthen and shape your legs and arms 7. It increase vitamin D levels 8. It gives you energy 9. and make you happy. Let's walk! The Botanical Garden of Curitiba more than a mile of pathways to walk in. 
Nobody has marked this note useful
